attributes.action: Petition to abolish compulsory quarantine for people arriving into UK
attributes.additional_details:
With regards to the Covid-19 pandemic the World Health Organisation has stressed the importance of testing. The UK government has been keen to rise to the challenge and increase the target number of tests per day. 

It would be therefore reasonable to consider the expansion of the testing to people entering into the UK.
attributes.background:
I ask UK citizens and residents to support this petition addressed to the Honourable Members of Parliament to: 

- Abolish the quarantine of people entering the UK
- Implement testing on all people who enter the UK borders on their arrival

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Do not enforce a compulsory quarantine on people arriving in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320329

Start screening every person who enters UK for Coronavirus: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301188
